Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.OwnerOnly
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
[Group("statuscommands", "Commands to manage bot status")]
public class SlashOwnerOnly.StatusCommands : MewdekoSlashModuleBase<OwnerOnlyService>, IInteractionModuleBase

Constructors

| Edit this page View Source

StatusCommands(Mewdeko, DiscordSocketClient)

Commands to manage the bot's status and presence.

Declaration
public StatusCommands(Mewdeko bot, DiscordSocketClient client)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Mewdeko bot

The bot instance to manage.
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord client used to interact with the Discord API.

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

AddPlaying(ActivityType, string)

Adds a new status to the rotation of playing statuses for the bot.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("addplaying", "Adds a playing status to the rotating status list", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task AddPlaying(ActivityType t, string status)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ActivityType t

The type of activity (e.g., Playing, Streaming).
string status

The text of the status to add.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Adds a new status with the specified activity type and text. Confirmation of addition is sent as a reply.

| Edit this page View Source

ListPlaying()

Lists all statuses currently in the rotation.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("listplaying", "Lists all rotating statuses", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task ListPlaying()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Sends a reply with a numbered list of all statuses in the rotation. If no statuses are set, sends an error message.

| Edit this page View Source

RemovePlaying(int)

Removes a status from the rotating playing statuses by its index.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("removeplaying", "Removes a status from the rotating status list", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task RemovePlaying(int index)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int index

The one-based index of the status to remove. The actual removal will use zero-based indexing.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

If the status at the provided index exists, it will be removed, and a confirmation message is sent.

| Edit this page View Source

RotatePlaying()

Toggles the rotation of playing statuses for the bot.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("rotateplaying", "Toggles rotating playing status", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task RotatePlaying()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

If rotation is enabled, it will be disabled, and vice versa. Confirmation of the action is sent as a reply.

| Edit this page View Source

SetGame(ActivityType, string?)

Sets the bot's currently playing game.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("setgame", "Sets the bots now playing. Disabled rotating status", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task SetGame(ActivityType type, string? game = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ActivityType type

The type of activity (e.g., Playing, Streaming).
string game

The name of the game or activity. If null, might clear the current game.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This method updates the bot's "Playing" status. The actual displayed status will depend on the provided activity type.

| Edit this page View Source

SetStatus(SettableUserStatus)

Sets the bot's online status.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("setstatus", "Sets the bots status (DND, Offline, etc)", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task SetStatus(SlashOwnerOnly.SettableUserStatus status)
Parameters
Type Name Description
SlashOwnerOnly.SettableUserStatus status

The new status to set.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Changes the bot's presence status to one of the specified options: Online, Idle, Do Not Disturb, or Invisible.

| Edit this page View Source

SetStream(string, string?)

Sets the bot's streaming status.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("setstream", "Sets the stream url (such as Twitch)", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task SetStream(string url, string? name = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string url

The URL of the stream.
string name

The name of the stream. If null, might use a default name or no name.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Changes the bot's activity to streaming, using the provided URL and name for the stream. Useful for when the bot is used to indicate live streams.

Discord.Interactions.IInteractionModuleBase
